reviews.text: If I can rate this bakery 10 stars believe me I will. The service was excellent, the food was amazing specially the desserts. Can‚Äôt wait to go back. 100% recommend

Un lugar muy hermoso para venir a disfrutar de la comida y los postres. Muy buen servicio. Naomi fue quien nos atendi√≥, muy atenta y siempre pendiente.
Muy sabroso todo y Muy Amable la mesera nahomy
food was great, atmosphere was nice, even my very picky girlfriend was happy with the place, will be coming back for sure

One of the things I hate is dishonesty a lot of people hyped this place up and is not worth the price everything looks pretty but is not worth the price at all pastries where old had no taste very disappointing stop believing what you see on instagram .
Customer service is incredibly phenomenal, very good. The food is great. I recommend them. If you want to enjoy it 100%,  meke Reservation.
Since we entered the host with a bad temper, a disorder in totality, I don't recommend this place.
Excelente servicio top top

An absolute gem!
Jhoanes Bakery & Coffee is one of those rare places that instantly makes you feel at home the moment you walk in. The atmosphere is warm, cozy, and beautifully designed you can tell that every detail was created with love and passion.

Their croissants are truly something special flaky on the outside, soft and buttery on the inside, with the kind of flavor that makes you close your eyes and smile. Each one tastes freshly baked and full of care.

The Colombian coffee is another highlight rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced. You can really taste the quality of the beans and the skill behind every cup. Whether it‚Äôs a cappuccino, espresso, or latte, everything is made with precision and heart.

What makes it even better is the amazing service. The people who work there are friendly, kind, and genuinely happy to see you enjoy what they create. It‚Äôs rare to find that kind of energy these days.

Everything at Jhoanes Bakery & Coffee is simply delicious. It‚Äôs the kind of place you go once and immediately know you‚Äôll be back, again and again. Highly, highly recommended!
Amazing
Loved the breakfast and the dessert is even better !! A Gem in Astoria ‚úÖ
La attention de Domenika muy  excellent  amable  y professional, el lugar muy recomendado  me encanto.
James was our server and he was amazing! Everything came just as we asked and the service was amazing!

EDIT: Someone replied and tried to gaslight me into saying that the "extra" price of milk in coffee was clearly displayed, which it was NOT. I definitely would have walked out without ordering. The "extra" price was not on the board in the restaurant, nor is it on their website.
ORIGINAL REVIEW: I struggled with the ethics of leaving 1 star, since I only came in for a takeout coffee, but the owners need to know that they're wrong. Coffee is expensive now so I wasn't shocked at paying $4-- but what I did NOT expect was that the price came to $4.90 because they charged me to add a splash of half & half. They charged me 90 cents for something that, since the dawn of time, in every other cafe on earth, just comes included with the price of the coffee when you order it. Honestly it's such a small thing, but it's really weird and greedy; it feels like a new level of unethical business, and it's a huge middle finger to the customer. Do they charge for syrup when you order pancakes, even though everyone understands that they just go together? I wouldn't be surprised. The restaurant is absolutely gorgeous, beautifully Instagrammable-- but if they nickel and dime customers like this I hope it drives them out of business fast.

Una delicia las arepas y los croissant üòç adem√°s este postre de passion fruit 10/10
El servicio excelente muy amable una se√±orita llamada Celeste que nos ayud√≥ y estaba muy pendiente en todo el tiempo que estuvimos disfrutando de todo lo rico que tienen en el men√∫.
Recomendado al 100% ‚ú®
Buen servicio, amistoso y respetuoso. Buena calidad y gran variedad de opciones.
El servicio espectacular y la comida deliciosaaaaa
Es super rico la comida 100 de 100
No worth it‚Ä¶ 45+ waiting for 2 omelets and they messed up our order. Customer service was not good here.

Excelente ambiente y la comida al igual, lo √∫nico que nos dejaron esperando casi 10 minutos que nos atendieran ya sea para sentarnos o para llevar , pero despu√©s de todo gracias a Nasly que nos atendi√≥ de maravilla 10/10 .

The food was great! options change daily though so you don't really know what your going to get until your there. The waitresses were very nice, and we also met Jhoanes. There is usually a line with aout 5 to 7 people so get there early.
Gracias celeste por tu colaboraci√≥n, volver√© , todo excelente

Honestly the best croissants i‚Äôve ever had in new york, ambiance and service, Michelle was so attentive and gave the best recommendations, highly recommend!.

Incre√≠ble lugar, tuvimos que esperar por una mesa 1 hora pero vali√≥ totalmente la pena, la carne ten√≠a un sabor inigualable, el cafe colombiano estaba muy bueno, nuestra mesera Michelle nos recomend√≥ los postres y fue completamente acertada a lo que quer√≠amos, un nuevo y llamativo lugar en Astoria.

Este lugar fue una experiencia bonita . Est√° muy lindo decorado, con un ambiente acogedor y lleno de detalles. El personal fue s√∫per amable desde que llegamos, y la comida estaba espectacular ‚Äî todo lo que probamos estaba delicioso. Para ser una bakery, tienen un men√∫ sorprendentemente amplio con much√≠simas opciones. Adem√°s, el servicio de nuestra mesera, Michelle, fue excelente: muy atenta, amable y con una gran sonrisa todo el tiempo. Obviamente fui por los postres que aparte de verse divinos estuvieron deliciosos ¬°Definitivamente volver√©!
Muy rico pero el service demasiado lento la fila es muy larga y el restaurants esta bacon adentro dejan las personas mucho tiempo afuera que lastima
Amazing place
Todo muy bueno, excelente servicio, naomi y las demas muchachas muy amables volver√®

We waited over 45 minutes outside just for takeout. The woman working the line told us our wait time would be extended because they‚Äôd just received a large party order‚Äîwithout any clear update on how much longer it would actually be. By the time we finally got inside (an hour and 15 minutes later), they were basically sold out of almost everything.

What‚Äôs disappointing is that no one came outside to give updates or communicate what was happening. It‚Äôs frustrating to stand in line that long with no information. If you‚Äôre offering ‚Äútrendy,‚Äù ‚ÄúInstagram-worthy‚Äù treats, you also need to be able to keep up with the demand and treat the people waiting to support your business with respect.

On top of that, the staff‚Äôs response‚Äî‚Äúwell, it is what it is‚Äù‚Äîwas incredibly dismissive. Please train your team to be more considerate and communicative. Your customers deserve better.
Waiting on line for a hour and when you get inside they don‚Äôt have anything left, the waitresses are super rude.
Vinimos con mis amigas y probamos 3 de los postres en forma de fruta, el de mango, lim√≥n y pera. Deliciosos ü§§, y el capuchino tambi√©n üòç
Super cute and delicious. Great service by Naomi.

Completely unorganized!!!  Waited over 45 min for a table in the cold to be told we cannot accommodate any walk-ins. All that after‚Ä¶allowing a party of 11 to walk in!  The hostess could have just said from the beginning no walk-ins allowed and that would have been just fine.  Never going there again and wasting my time.
The fruit pastries are AMAZING !! The detail is nice and the flavors are outstanding !!! Definitely worth the money !!!
Naomi was our server and explained each dessert with detail. Will be back!
desde que entras hasta que te vas todo es esquisito. la comida deliciosa los postres muy ricos y fuera de lo comun. la mesera muy amable y atenta les recomiendo mucho este restaurante

WOOO LA COMIDA SUPER DELICIOSA,  LOS POSTRES DELICIOSOS!!  EL CAFE, LAS BEBIDAS NATURALES WOOO! LA CALIDAD DE LA COMIDA EXELENTE! A MI FAMILIA  Y A MI NOS ENCANTO TODOOO!   LO RECOMIENDO  100%100! DIOS BENDIGA  ESTE LUGAR Y LO SIGA PROSPERANDO.

My family and I went on a SATURDAY so be warned, the place is gonna be BUSY! Very nice, clean, and a little small but I really did enjoy my time there and look forward to my next visit!
Their deserts are EVERYTHING! If the owner sees this‚Ä¶ you might have to EXPAND the place, this is a HIT!
El brunch was good , bakery is very busy . I recommend to do reservations. Desserts are beautiful. James was very nice and friendly.

HEAR ME OUTTT!!
So basically, I visited this bakery yesterday in the morning. As soon as I opened the door, the waitress greeted me warmly. I loved the environment and the vibes. I ordered some food, and it came out really fast . It had great flavor and was rich in taste. I also got some pastries to go, along with arepas and a croissant sandwich, all beautifully presented. Also loved their seasonal decorations, makes you really comfortable.
The prices were reasonable, and trying the pastries was such a great experience. I‚Äôm planning to go back next week because I wanted to try some other fruit options, but they weren‚Äôt available this time. I suggest calling ahead if you want to try a specific fruit pastry, just to make sure they have it in stock.

Awesome experience. Don‚Äôt know where to start. We wait for an hour to get a table but it‚Äôs ok (was worth for the wait) everyone so welcoming friendly here. Love how they organized have 2 lines one for to go order another line for dine in.
The food grilled chicken in tomato sauce with roasted potatoes excellent! Wish a bit bigger slice of the chicken but food more than enough ,the sweet &savory waffle was delicious my bacon needs to be more crispy but overall it was really good. Avocado panini more as a ‚Äúclub sandwich style‚Äù but can‚Äôt complain everybody was happy with their food.

Dessert OMG! We love sweets and eat so many places,but Jhoanes bakery very outstanding!
My absolute favorite the mango coconut in chocolate shell! Pistachios and the passion fruit with nutella also was not just beautiful quality and  very well made.
People working so hard to make sure you have a good time.Definitely coming back!
Next family bday cake order will be here!

Found this place in Astoria Amazing food! Everything was so flavorful and well made. The atmosphere gave off fancy vibes.. the staff was so nice and attentive.. the Desserts were fabulous and absolutely delicious! There is a window in the back where you can see the chef working- every thing was made fresh..and I will definitely be returning! 10/10!

Comimos dos hamburguesas, y los postres de las fotos, las hamburguesas estaban bien les dimos una calificaci√≥n de 6/10 solo porque creemos que a nuestro paladar les falta un toque m√°s de condimento, realmente tuve que abrirla y colocarle sal, pero buena combinaci√≥n con las papas fritas super crujientes, el pan suave y la tocineta crujiente, el chai latte caliente estuvo muy bueno, igualmente el latte, ahora con lo mas controversial del lugar, sus bonitos postres, ac√° nuestra opini√≥n personal de lo que probamos, cr√®me br√ªl√©e muy buen sabor y cremoso 10/10, el coco personalmente no nos gusto, es demasiado mango 4/10, se siente casi como comerte directamente la fruta y no un postre, me gusto mucho la idea y le tenia muchas esperanzas a este en especial pero no nos gusto, y el coraz√≥n de passion fruit relleno de nutella estuvo muy delicioso, la consistencia, el relleno y el sabor a passion fruit es justo el indicado le dimos un 8/10. Fuimos un martes en la tarde y realmente logramos pasar sin problema ni fila alguna, se los recomiendo si quieren probar algo distinto en la ciudad y es un buen plan para pasar el rato en un d√≠a de semana y comer algo dulce o salado porque tienen variedad. Atenci√≥n de parte de las mesoneras muy buena, la verdad estuvieron al tanto en todo momento. Y el lugar muy lindo y limpio.

This review is about breakfast experience at Jhoanes'; which is much more than croissant capital of Astoria, their apparent signature offering. A visual and gastronomic delicacy, we could see croissants were the most popular breakfast option on that day. Everything else could be fillers around that central theme. And our experience is about that exclusion set of everything else.
First off, the approach is refreshingly creative.
The order of caprese savory waffle came in strong, with mozzarella shining through.
Berry coulis in 'pancake paradise' was a novelty idea, hit the right notes. Vaunted fluffiness of pancakes could be attributed more to creative use of egg-rings to contain the shape and enhance the rise.
Washed my syrupy fingers in the basement washroom, which was clean and had defining wallpaper. Nice!
We carried home a small selection of stylish fruit shaped desserts, which were okay, droplets suggestiong they'd likely seen some temperature & humidity variations.
Fresh squeezed juices (orange & mango) were delectable, but contained so much ice that taste was getting diluted quickly. We just had to rush through and finish them. Next time, it'll be 'no ice, please'.
Indoor seating for ~30, plus 6-8 outdoors.
Cutlery was cutesy, we loved it. And yes, food presentation was so appealing.
Menu is a bit overpriced if you are aiming at value for money.

The loury part:
Entire decor is faux botanicals, to a density that it becomes tacky. Eminently  instagrammable, yes. Maybe good for a night spot, but at breakfast time?  Also wondering how healthy it is to have such concentration of botanical plastics hanging around food fumes.
Service was relaxed. Think twice if you are time-boxed with a follow-through appointment to keep.
Our lattes came artfully poured but the 16oz cup was definitely not that quantity. Next time we're going in with a measure. If it checks out, I'll be happy to take this part down with an apology.

Overall, our experience did not rise to the level of curated image built over social media. We're saying this respectfully, and in good faith; hoping the management will address few aspects, if they concur.
Chef Johanes is also an acclaimed instructor, it should be okay to hold his establishment to a higher standard.

I ordered some desserts to go, and they were really delicious. I was honestly surprised because I didn‚Äôt have high expectations at first. I thought they would be just sugary, but it was the complete opposite ‚Äî fresh desserts with fruity flavors and a beautiful presentation. I had never tried desserts like these before, and I highly recommend them. If you want to enjoy truly good desserts, this is the right place. It gets quite busy on weekends, so it‚Äôs a good idea to make a reservation. The place is lovely, the service is great, and the desserts were absolutely wonderful. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back.

I have so much high expectations to the cafe itself. I heard it from a friend and read good reviews about it but it met most of my dissatisfaction. I am not picky when it comes to food, everybody that knows me can say that and know that. When we got in the store, line was very long but it was actually the best to go line. We were approached at the line and questioned if we are staying. We were told it was 40 minutes wait and we were willing to wait. Another family came after us. And we gave them the information on what we had yet they got taken first. I approached the waitress and I told her that we were told that we were next and she told me a lie that the family was there first. I told her that we were here before them. I let the family remained seated but was disappointed with the waitress and her lie. We ordered but croissant was all out and what was left was the cold dessert. We ordered three kinds of dessert but only taste good which is the triple layer mouse. We ordered mango juice, iced matcha, hot chocolate and latte. I love coffee but didn‚Äôt even get to finish it because it doesn‚Äôt taste as I expected it. Not even close to French coffee When my coffee first came, the cup that it was served has marked of lipstick in both sides. Mango and ice matcha tasted like water with color. Hot chocolate is ok coz my mom had finished it. We requested for the mango juice and ice matcha to be replaced and fix but was still disappointed. I guess my taste preference is not the same as the one in the good reviews. Everything looks perfect and good until I tasted it. This review is not to hurt the company but to help you improve the quality of your business to serve the  neighborhood. God bless

Absolutely excellent spot!
Everything‚Äîfrom the food and drinks to the service‚Äîis consistently on point. Their croissants are among the best you‚Äôll find in Astoria, with a great variety of delicious flavors to choose from.

But this place is more than just a bakery. The menu is surprisingly extensive, offering everything from waffles and pancakes to hearty sandwiches and more.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for quality food in a cozy, welcoming setting!

I ordered a custom cake for my daughter‚Äôs 1st birthday, and it turned out absolutely perfect!  The design looked exactly like the photo I provided ‚Äî every detail was spot on. The cake was fresh, moist, and delicious that everyone loved it! Thank you for making such a beautiful and tasty cake for such a special day.

I‚Äôm very grateful to the staff at this restaurant; everything is absolutely delicious, I highly recommend it. The service is excellent, the desserts are amazing, and it‚Äôs definitely worth visiting on weekdays because it gets really busy on weekends. Even though he was busy, Alexi was a great server and very attentive.

I visited the place with my wife, the overall experience was positive, the menu was not 100% available at least not with desserts or juices, even so my selection was good, my arepa was great and my wife was equally satisfied with her pancakes, we also had two desserts to take home that we have not tried yet but I have no doubt that they will be as good as they look, Celeste's service was great, thank you.

Para los amantes de los postresüç® dulces, cremoso y equilibrado; recomendado! Todo delicioso, sin duda alguna regresar√© a probar sus desayunos y dem√°s postres que me faltaron por probar. Principalmente iba por el postre de mango ü•≠ pero llegu√© tarde. As√≠ que se recomienda ir temprano porque se acaba r√°pido.
Their desserts were all nice and tasty. I really enjoyed having the passion fruit mousse with nutella filled and the strawberry. Next time I wanna try an apple one.

This place has such a fun vibe with floral and greenery decor. But let's be real, we are here for the food. The pastry presentation is top notch, but the flavor profile and quality matches it perfectly! Staff was super friendly as well. Highly recommend!
Such a great experience, the food was really good and the servers are super friendly. 10/10 would recommend. We took some pastries home!! Can‚Äôt wait to come back !!

10/10 Today I try dulce de leche croissant I love it the flavor of sweet. ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ü§ç it‚Äôs crunchy soft and buttery. I will come back and get more flavors I love the place very comfortable and to have a brunch.

Jhoanes Bakery is an exceptional place to enjoy delicious food, premium coffee, and delightful desserts. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the service is consistently outstanding. Highly recommended for a quality dining experience."

The food is amazinggg, flavors indescribable ! You just HAVE to be here to try. My tongue exploded with flavor trying everything, only downside is you‚Äôll never want to leave! Place is so aesthetically pleasing, everyone‚Äôs so kind and the owners are so kind.

We came for dessert since we previously had dinner elsewhere.  The desserts were beautiful and delicious. The menu had breakfast,  lunch, and dinner options, as well as a wide assortment of juices and coffees. Definitely will return to try their other items on the menu. The staff and service were superb. This is a must do and I highly recommend it!

This was my first time going to the restaurant, I really loved the atmosphere and the service was amazing. I really enjoyed the desserts and definitely recommend this restaurant. There are also these baking classes that have helped me improve in my pastries by Chef Jhoanes is called Magic School Bakery for those of you who might be interested!

I had such a wonderful experience at Joanes in Astoria! The hot chocolate here is simply amazing‚Äîrich, creamy, and beautifully presented with gorgeous latte art that makes it feel extra special. The cozy atmosphere and attention to detail really stood out. It‚Äôs the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a warm drink, and I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more. Highly recommend!

The quality and flavor are indisputable!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
We've been ordering our cakes with Jhoanes for over four years, I think... and now he did my baby shower a different experience BUT he did everything exactly as I had envisioned and more. His job is beyond words, and the flavor is out of this world as well. Just as the dessert looks, so is its flavor! Thank you again guys for the excellent job!!! üíôüíôüíô

Todo exquisito
Gourmet. No empalaga. Disfrute cada postres. Mi primera vez y prove 5 postres. Dificil escoger cual es mejor.

One of the most disappointing visits I‚Äôve had in a while, with the most popular pastry, the mango, not living up to the hype it has been made out to be. But in the end, that‚Äôs fine; some places are a hit or miss. However, what I can‚Äôt stand is when the hospitality is nothing but garbage. I initially ordered for takeout, but I decided to keep it in at the last minute. I asked the employees if it was okay, and I made it clear that if there were a problem, I would leave. However, they said it was OK if I ordered something else, which I did. However, the number of stares i received and the expressions on their faces made at me immediately indicated that it was a problem for the workers . All in all, I would say that I don‚Äôt wish anything bad for a restaurant, but if you are going to work at a popular place, at least have some more respectful/patient employees who will help elevate the experience, even if the food is subpar.
Great staff! Very attentive, professional and warm! Food was delicious! Great options for kids! This is a craving spot!

Si tienen la oportunidad de ir NO la desaprovechen!!ü§©ü§© vale 100% la pena, servicio, comida deliciosa y costos accesibles, nos encanto! Sin duda volver√≠amos a ir, ambiente muy tranquilo y la zona de Astoria es muy bonitaüåÉüëèüèª
The food was good , drinks mocha and latte  were okay, the service was not as expected maybe because there were busy but the overall experience was okay

Dangerously good. Haven‚Äôt had a menu item I don‚Äôt like. Great pastries and strong (quality) coffee to pair with it. Welcoming, VIBRANT, cozy atmosphere.
My favorites (so far) are the bow tie chocolate filled croissant and the key lime stuffed croissant. The fruit pastries are great too though! None of that syrup other shops drench things in, just well selected, fresh berries paired with craft sweet creams.
Another nice detail about the place is that there‚Äôs a window where you can see the pastries being crafted, and the owner/head pastry chef is often around. Just adds an air of magic to the place.

+ the staff is bilingual üëç (English/Spanish)

I found this place thanks to a recommendation from Manu King Food on Instagram, and a friend and I had breakfast and lunch as recommended... I loved it... and now it's a go-to when I want coffee or a sweet treat. Keep improving. Thanks ü´Ç

I would rate my overall experience 3 stars. The aesthetic of the place was absolutely stunning ‚Äî beautifully designed and very inviting. The presentation, quality, and taste of the food were also really impressive.
However, I was disappointed with the service. Given how busy this bakery is, there really should be more than 3‚Äì4 staff members working. Although I was seated right away (I arrived early), it took about 30 minutes before anyone came to take my order. That‚Äôs a long time to wait, especially without any acknowledgment.
Additionally, after my food was served, no one came by to check in ‚Äî no follow-up to see if everything was okay or if I needed anything else. That kind of attentiveness makes a big difference in the dining experience.
Lastly, as a bakery, I expected a variety of pastries and cakes to be available. Unfortunately, everything was sold out, which was disappointing since I was really looking forward to trying something sweet.
Overall, the food and atmosphere were great, but the service and limited bakery selection left a lot to be desired. I hope they work on these areas, because the place has a lot of potential.

Soy de Espa√±a, estaba de vacaciones y me sali√≥ en recomendaci√≥n en Instagram; me encant√≥!!! Delicioso todo, calidad precio super bien adem√°s de que son todos muy majos y atentos.
Seguro que volver√©!! Qued√© con ganas de probar m√°s cosas!!!

Jhoanes bakery did it again!! My husband‚Äôs cake was not only beautiful but very tasty. Moist and not too sweet. It was a chocolate cake with passion fruit filling. Love it.. Thank you for a job well done..
The staff is so friend Super clean, good energy. Every dish was delicious, and the presentation was beautiful. We came here because a family member loves Jhoanes content! I can see why üòä

I love this place!! We went here with our pregnant friend and the service was outstanding! They were super patient with us while we took pictures and decided what to order.
The food and desserts were delicious!
Super recommended!
Got a custom cake made for my baby‚Äôs first birthday and it was exactly what I asked for. The cake was so moist and delicious!! The buttercream was also exquisite. Highly recommend!!

40 minutes in line for just for a 2 beef pastry that I want.
Guy kept telling me that the inside was full when it was not.
A lot of people were complaining about the wait time.
It's ridiculous. Then the host came out and I ask him, I'm just here for 1 item even if I was next in line. I never wanted to waste anyone's time so I ask him
"Can I come in and check?
He said no you have to wait 25 more minutes.

" I replied : what if the one I wanted to order is not even there?"
Guess what 15 minutes more now a total of 55 mins of wait for nothing!!

Didn't even apologize.
Cashier was like you can only order it in the morning when you are you waiting you can say what want to check. Ask if I want something else.

Other than that my wife was also waiting in the car so now I have to deal with her, also I paid parking just to get this type of treatment and low quality service.
OMG.. this place has the coolest vibe & the food & presentation is a 12/10. 2nd day in a row we have been here. If we lived in Queens we would be here almost daily. HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend!!
Los meseros son muy atentos. Los postres son realmente deliciosos y creativos. Es un lugar peque√±o,  pero acogedor.

Since I arrived, Aynara and Alex served me very well. They recommended several desserts that, honestly, tasted just as amazing as they looked‚Äîsuper delicious! I would definitely come back. ‚ú®

Thank you for making my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday very pleasant. ‚ú®

This place is a true gem! The coffee was smooth and flavorful, the pastries and desserts were fresh and absolutely delicious, and the brunch was outstanding ‚Äî every dish was beautifully presented and full of flavor. You can really taste the care and quality in everything they make.

The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, and the staff couldn‚Äôt have been kinder or more attentive. It‚Äôs the kind of place that makes you want to slow down, relax, and enjoy every bite.

I‚Äôll definitely be back soon ‚Äî this has quickly become one of my favorite spots for coffee, pastries, and brunch! Highly recommend!

Las mejores hamburguesas y postres que me he comido, de verdad vali√≥ la pena hacer ido, y el ambiente y sus trabajadores son un amor, lo recomiendo 100% ame el postre de passionfruit y mango una deliciaüòç

Picked up a beautiful and delicious birthday cake. Ordering online was easy.  Cake was a delight to look at and very well packed so that I could carry it several blocks without any damage. Every detail was perfect.  Employees were lovely and the other desserts in the restaurant looked incredible.  Highly recommend!

For those who are wondering if it‚Äôs worth it, absolutely yes. Pastries are pure heaven, if you aren‚Äôt in Astoria and debating on coming here, please do. This is an authentic place and business with unreal exotic flavors in a good way. Matcha had a sweet good quality flavor too. My personal favorites were the apple essence & tropical bliss. Both hold very good and out of the world flavors. You just have to be here. The only bad side of this place I hated was the fact u never want to leave after a bite!!
